articles.author: David L. Stern, Ellen Francis, Siobhán O'Grady
articles.title: Trump drops ceasefire demand for Ukraine war after summit with Putin - The Washington Post
articles.description: An immediate ceasefire to the war in Ukraine had long been a bedrock demand by the U.S., Ukraine and their European allies.
articles.content: KYIV President Donald Trump said Saturday that Ukraine and Russia should go straight to agreeing on a final peace deal, dropping his demand for a ceasefire in a dramatic reversal that aligns him with… [+68 chars]
